profile.title: My Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your personal information
profile.passwordChangeInfo: Leave blank if you do not want to change your password
profile.dangerZoneInfo: These actions are irreversible. Think carefully before continuing.

deleteList.comments: All comments associated with your account

profile.deleteAdminWarning: AS AN ADMINISTRATOR, you will lose ALL your admin privileges! This action is IRREVERSIBLE!

deleteConfirm.admin:
FINAL CONFIRMATION - ADMINISTRATOR

This action is IRREVERSIBLE!

AS AN ADMINISTRATOR, you will lose:
• Your user profile
• All your likes and comments
• All your articles/reviews
• All likes on your content
• YOUR ADMINISTRATOR STATUS
• Access to site statistics
• Ability to add content
• Ability to delete content

YOU WILL NO LONGER BE ABLE TO ADMINISTER THE SITE!

Do you really want to continue?
deleteConfirm.user:
FINAL CONFIRMATION

This action is IRREVERSIBLE!

Your account and ALL your data will be deleted:
• Your profile
• All your likes and comments
• All your articles/reviews
• All likes on your content

Do you really want to continue?

likesManager.title: Likes Statistics
likesManager.fixDesc: Diagnoses, cleans and synchronizes all likes
likesManager.fixConfirm:
🔧 Do you want to start the automatic likes repair?

This operation will:
• Diagnose issues
• Clean orphaned likes
• Synchronize all counters

Continue?

userManager.title: User Management
userManager.deleteConfirm:
⚠️ DANGER! Permanently delete {{username}} ({{email}})?

This action will delete EVERYTHING:
• The user account
• All their likes
• All their articles/reviews
• All likes on their content

This action is IRREVERSIBLE!

Type "SUPPRIMER" to confirm:
userManager.cleanupConfirm:
🧹 Clean orphaned likes?

This will remove all likes from users who no longer exist and fix the counters.

Continue?
